text:
If a bar had to be set for a fully automated mobile bank, Moneylion doesnt even deserve a participation award.

I originally made an account for a credit building loan. It did help some with raising my credit score in the first couple months. The $20 fee/month is steep, though, and I would never trust this bank with my direct deposit to waive the fee.

A few weeks ago my alternator and battery crapped out on me, and then I blew two tires, fortunately right after payday. I wanted a small buffer to make sure my boyfriend and I could make it a few days before his paycheck came in, as we share an account. So I used instacash for $50. Tried to use turbo and it refused to take my card info, so I was stuck waiting the 2-3 days. When I agreed it said that the due date would be on my next paydate. There was a pop-up asking for a $3 tip, and I agreed thinking that the tip was part of the $50 and I'd be charged $53. I moved the slider to the $3 on the next page, as well, not realizing they were separate. The next day there's a $3 transaction for the tip. The money deposited in two days, and then I get a text stating that $53 will be billed the next day. So they beg for tips a lot, which I'd get if they didn't already charge $20/month, but that's ridiculous and greedy. I feel duped because of the way they present the additional request for tips. As for the instacash, I logged in and it back dated my due date to my last paycheck. I regret not screenshotting the page showing my due date because I know 100% for a fact what I agreed to and it was not to be billed as soon as their ridiculously slow system finally processed and decided that it wanted to change the terms after agreement. I sent an email asking them to defer payment. They told me there's nothing they can do because it's all automated. I responded that their automated system backdated my due date and I did not agree to a previous payday being my due date, and I received an email back essentially stating that I'm wrong and that I did agree to that because "they did disclose all the information" right after I was told that this is a known error that their engineers are working on because it's apparently common. That is absolute horsesh!t. For one, don't tell me it's a known problem and then tell me it's my fault because your system disclosed the info. It obviously didn't. And two, the fact that there's an entirely automated system handling people's money that not a single person can assist with when it breaks baffles me. If you want to have a fully automated system like that, at least make sure it works before you start taking people's money. Technology breaks. We need real people in order to fix the inevitable.

I hate that calling to ask questions, waiting on hold or for a callback, results in "make sure your app is updated and do it yourself." What is the point of customer service?
Their automation is so flawed it hurts. My debit card was stolen and it resulted in a missed membership payment. I made it up as soon as i noticed it shortly after and it took two months to process. I emailed asking why, if the payment went through (they took money same day), and if not should I call in to pay it. They said it went through but takes 3-5 days to process and that they can't take payments over the phone. This is laughable, as I called in 60 says later to ask and all it did was raise more questions, such as:  What the hell CAN your customer service do?? Aside from snotty emails telling me I'm wrong after acknowledging their system is basically broken and telling me to do it myself and call back with questions.

I'm all for technology and automation done right, but this is a perfect example of flawed execution. People are necessary. If you want a half-baked company, at least make one that doesn't handle your finances. That's the worst thing to half-bake.
title: Nothing but room for improvement

text: So far the only issue I‚Äôve had is linking my account with plaid. I was wanting to join credit builder but since I can‚Äôt link my account I‚Äôve been unable to join. They want you to use direct deposit but then you have no way of proving income without linking your account. Very irritating!!!

text:
Omg worst bank i ever experienced ever. DO NOT GET THIS BANK! 
I got an account on wed. I had a deposit go in the next day of $500. 
I havent been able to access my funds and it is sunday
 Bc i dont have a debit card from them yet. They only accept certain banks
 They should have an option for temporary card like chime while u wait dor uour card to come in the mail. I got a chime account and they are AMAZING. No one in customer service knows what their doing someone said chime doesnt link to money lion but it does. I cant add another card and transfer to funds to it. I Cant add my spouses card bc my name isnt on it and when i trasnfer my fund finally on a friday to the chime bank it said it takes 1-3 business days it sucks they dont work on it thru the weekend. No prepaid cards like cash app venmo or paypal can be added. It took w days to link up with paypal and venmo but yet today (sunday) i tried to put money on my paypal thru moneylion and it said error. No other place accepts this bank. I have been stuck with no groceries no gas and my lights went out TODAY bc i couldnt use my funds!!!!! I am praying to god my fund will be transferred already to chime by tomorrow morning but who knows with this stupid bank it probably wont be. This has been the worst bank i have ever experienced.
title: Omg worst bank i ever experienced!

title: Too many hidden fees!!!

text: They have so much hidden fees and terrible customer service. We got approved for a $500 loan, only given 300 and told that the ofter 200 was help in escrow until i pay off the full 500. Then i was told that I can apply that 200 in escrow to pay off the existing loan if i wanted. So when i agreed to use that 200, I was told to pay 300 first before I can use the 200 to pay off the loan. ON TOP of getting that loan, I also used their debit card for emergency, and when I needed it most, IT DIDNT WORK! And when i contacted CSR they said there was nothing they could do! Terrible!!!! Their membership fees are expensive for the type of service we are given!!!!
title: TERRIBLE! TERRIBLE! TERRIBLE!

text:
Since my last bad review I gave to them it incredibly got worse! So they are saying that my issue was resolved and that my loan was paid off. It took 3 weeks to get this resolved,if it truly is. For my troubles they told me they were giving me 2 $25 gift cards but told me this with attitude and actually said in an email that" the conversation will end here". That's right! for my troubles they caused they said to me, we're compensating you but this is where it ends!!So, per their instruction, they said just go to the website redeem awards and you can pick 2 $25 gift cards. I did this and guess what? you have to download their app. I said,wow! slap me again already. So I did, wasn't able to redeem. I called in 45 minutes later with back and forth discussion and finally the rep told me that,YOU CAN NOT REDEEM THESE REWARDS UNLESS YOU HAVE OUR CHECKING ACCOUNT OR CREDIT CARD!!!!! SO THEY'VE SLAPPED ME IN THE FACE REPEATEDLY AND THEN SAID WE'RE GOING TO COMPENSATE YOU FOR THIS BUT NOW WE CAN'T SO WE WANT TO SLAP YOU ONE MORE TIME! the rep then said, a supervisor will be calling you back but I'm very sorry for what you have gone through.I asked him did he see the string of emails that I've had over issues and he said,"YES"!  UNBELIEVABLE AWFUL EXPERIENCE!

Update- it seems all is resolved but was only able to redeem 1 $25 Walmart giftcard. Let me know when I'm able to redeem the other as I have followed the advice of 2 of your reps now and no luck.

Update- Here we are feb.16 and still never given the 2nd gift card that they mention they gave me on their follow up. They've had me do different things to try to use the 2nd one they mentioned but there app won't let me. It's just another technical issue they have. I'm done with them. Thanks for the wonderful compensation that you acted like you gave me for the hell you put me through. Keep your other pretend $25 that you acted like I could redeem. I'm absolutely 100% done with Moneylion.
title: Since my last bad review I gave to them‚Ä¶

text: At first I had no issues with using their checking account after I qualified for the MoneyLion loan. I then decide to use them as my primary bank for direct deposit and that‚Äôs when things got shady! My daily atm withdrawal limit is $510, I decided on 1/30/20 to withdraw $400 from an ATM. I could only withdraw $200 dollars at a time plus the fee for using an out of network atm so it was $202 to be charged to my account TWICE. Once I got home I decide to check my account and I see that it states I withdrew $202 THREE TIMES totalling $606 which is over my daily limit if $510! I called in which takes forever for that voice prompt to allow you to speak to someone who is no help! and they told to fill out a form online! I submit the form and no confirmation email within 24 hours so i call on 2/1/20! This rep tells me they‚Äôve had issues similar but they have to investigate! Why?? She also asked if i had receipts for my previous withdrawals because that would be HELPUL!? How???? When this account doesn‚Äôt let you overdraft, take out more than your daily limit, what is there to investigate?!? I want my money refunded I don‚Äôt want to wait 15 days for a BS investigation! Most horrible bank ever I am so upset my account is at negative and they don‚Äôt even credit your account as it states on their ZENDESK. STAY AWAY!!! There are second chance bank accounts and other banks that don‚Äôt charge fees and if you need pay day loans try Dave, BRIGIT, EARNIN!!!
title: Fraudulent BANK

text:
I have a money lion plus account and credit builder loan. I was unable to change my bank account number on the app. I tried online and was unable to do it there as well. I emailed asking for help well before the next due day. NO RESPONSE. 

Customer service does not have a good process for collecting payment either. Once I got someone on the phone to pay off the entire loan (because I got sick of them and their incompetent app and website), the customer service agent tried my payment and came back saying it was declined and asked did I have enough money on my account. I have money to cover the transactions!!!! This lady tried to run a payment of 21.50 (TEN) times on my debit card.NO WONDER WHY THE BANK STARTED DECLINING. I told her well duh obviously you have locked my debit card. My bank texted my saying they have an active fraud alert. Which is Money Lion. 

Why not process the lump sum payment instead of 10 separate transactions. Of course a bank will believe it is FRAUD. Now I have to go through this process of unlocking my debit card!!! Now I cannot use my card for anything. Just about gonna say F -- IT! 

It is such a hassle to even pay your damn bill with these folks. All of this happened because the app and website does not work properly. You cannot even update bank information properly. They need to work on their technical difficulties and improve customer service. This is a SCAM!
title: Incompetent website, App, and Customer Service!!!! Never again!

text: I tried both Money Lion and Dave and am only sticking with Dave at this point.   Dave was consistent and always hit my account on my payday each Friday if I did a small payday loan.  Money Lion on the other hand was inconsistent which caused me a couple fees through my bank.  So I cancelled my Money Lion acct by making a final payment of $54.99 to them.  Then the next day after cancelling they try to put through a check which THEY CREATED to themselves through my acct for another $54.99 causing me fees at the bank.  I've been emailing them now for 3 days about this and sent screenshots and have yet to get a response.
title: Money Lion - Lack of Customer Service

text:
Still on the phone with Moneylion since 4. its going on 6 now. 
This is my , fifth (most likely fourth), attempt at closing my account with Moneylion.

The options for loan payments and their APR, are defiantly NOT worth the eye sore. AND PROBABLY THE WORSE DECISION YOU COULD MAKE.

- Getting a Loan Locks you in for 1 year with Moneylion & their membership agreement. 

- Membership Agreement changes and updates to benefit Moneylion assets and expenses whenever they need money.

- Customer Services are all subjected to 5-30 business days to complete any request.

- Moneylion Plus loans are paid off two ways only - at the 'minimum monthly payment' requirements (typical by all credit companies of approx. 50$/month+-) (for 500$ loan*) + ** Membership Fees.** . (or you can pay off in full). 

- Moneylion offers Credit Building -BUT THEY DON'T, because Its not reported to credit agencies per month. ITS MORE LIKE CREDIT DEMOLITION - ONLY TAKES AFFECT WHEN LOAN GOES IN DEFAULT (meaning, if you miss a payment, they tell the Credit Agencies you missed a payment and liquid your investment account to cover the cost of the default loan AND YOURE LEFT WITH A BAD CREDIT REPORT. 

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

 - OFFERS DEALS SUCH A 1$ CASHBACK FOR CERTAIN ACTIONS TAKEN ON ACCOUNT, THEN CANCELLING 1$ CASHBACK AFTER REACHING HIGH CUSTOMER VOLUMES.??!!

 - CHANGES LOAN ApR TO ACCOMMODATE LOSS OF CUSTOMERS.?!!!

 - FALSE ADVERTISING LOANS ?!!!

 - Unorganized system updating ??!!

 - OUT OF COUNTRY CUSTOMER SUPPORT !!!??

 - Bad Phone system algorithms ??!!!

 - OUTSOURCED COMPANY PARTNERSHIPS control the speed of service of which Moneylion is supposedly controlling. !!!



Thank you for your time. - Take my words for what they are. SERIOUS + SPREAD THE MESSAGE TO HELP DETER HUMANS FROM UNNECESSARY, UNETHICAL EXPENSES PROVIDED BY SUCH COMPANIES.

-

Z3R0
title: Still on the phone with Moneylion since‚Ä¶

text: At first I was upset for signing up. Because of my scarcity mentality. Well its been a year and not only have I saved money but I have learned to be smart with my money, track where I spend my money.. and I am now investing my money! The $500 loan I received has helped my credit. Money lion is apart of my plan of financial literacy. When I first signed up I was living pay check to pay check. Not anymore! My credit has went up over 100 points and I am setting myself up to buy a home AND invest even more. Money Lion has been a great factor to my success. Have a plan in mind, then execute it!
title: Throwing money away!
